## âœ… Checklist

### For All PRs
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have included screenshots of my changes
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding style
- [ ] I have NOT modified any files unrelated to my change

### For New Projects
- [ ] I created my project in `/projects/my-project-name/` folder
- [ ] My project has an `index.html` file as the entry point
- [ ] I added my project entry to `projects.json` (NOT `index.html`)
- [ ] I tested that my project card displays correctly
- [ ] My project is responsive and works on mobile

### For Bug Fixes / Enhancements
- [ ] My changes ONLY address the specific issue mentioned
- [ ] I have NOT added any "bonus" features or unrelated changes
- [ ] I properly tested the fix/enhancement

---

## âš ï¸ IMPORTANT RULES

> **ğŸš¨ PRs will be CLOSED WITHOUT REVIEW if they:**
> 
> 1. âŒ Modify files **unrelated** to the issue being solved
> 2. âŒ Add "bonus" features or changes not requested
> 3. âŒ Touch `index.html` for adding projects (use `projects.json` instead)
> 4. âŒ Include AI-generated code that hasn't been reviewed
> 5. âŒ Don't include screenshots
> 6. âŒ Have merge conflicts
>
> **Please respect maintainer time. Stick to ONLY what the issue asks for.**
